SMS

An SMS template consists of a single template file:

  • body.txt is a Handlebars template for the text of the message

The alphanumeric sender of the SMS as it appears to the recipient of the message is dependant on the brand associated with the template when you upload it (more about templates here). The senders for each brand currently appear as follows:

Brand SMS Sender ID
OVO OVO Energy
Boost Boost Power
Corgi Corgi
VNet VNet
Lumo Lumo Energy
